overview: How big is too big? When it comes to booty, they ain't no limit, G. Bigger the better. Period. Know'm sayn? Let them white bitches do them crazy ass diets and shit. Dr. Atkins weren't no nigga, ya feel me? If he wuz, he'd be meatin up dem butts stead of slimmin em down. White doctors don't know shit, anyhow. If you illin, you best drag yo self to a voodoo doctor from the old country. He'll hook it up, but if you really wanna make yo self straight, pop if you really wanna make you self straight, pop this movie in and enjoy dese phat booties. I shot em just for you, playa.
title: Jelly 12
